# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty modify record zones operation.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You must set at least one of the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordZonesOperation/recordZonesToSave] or [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordZonesOperation/recordZoneIDsToDelete] properties before you execute the operation.

## Creating a Modify Zones Operation

- **init(recordZonesToSave:recordZoneIDsToDelete:)**: Creates an operation for modifying the specified record zones.
